| Group   | Agents                                  |
|---------|-----------------------------------------|
| default | 001,002,003,004,005,006,007,008,009,010 |
| group1  | 001,005,007,008,009                     |
| group2  | 002,005,006,008,010                     |
| group3  | 003,006,007,008                         |

| Agent | Name          | Groups                       | Status          |
|-------|---------------|------------------------------|-----------------|
| 000   | securics-master  |                              | active          |
| 001   | securics-agent1  | default,group1               | active          |
| 002   | securics-agent2  | default,group2               | active          |
| 003   | securics-agent3  | default,group3               | active          |
| 004   | securics-agent4  | default                      | active          |
| 005   | securics-agent5  | default,group1,group2        | active          |
| 006   | securics-agent6  | default,group2,group3        | active          |
| 007   | securics-agent7  | default,group1,group3        | active          |
| 008   | securics-agent8  | default,group1,group2,group3 | active          |
| 009   | securics-agent9  | default,group1               | disconnected    |
| 010   | securics-agent10 | default,group2               | disconnected    |
| 011   | securics-agent11 |                              | never_connected |
| 012   | securics-agent12 |                              | never_connected |

| Resource    | List                                                |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| agent:id    | 000,001,002,003,004,005,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |
| group:id    | default,group1,group2,group3                        |


| Actions                  | Resources | Allow | Deny                        |
|--------------------------|-----------|-------|-----------------------------|
| agent:read               | agent:id  |       | 000,002,004,006,008,010,012 |
